description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tile Trip is game of connections:  One player places tiles to connect his gophers on the bottom to the delicious carrots on top.  The second player connects his gophers on the left to the tasty flowers on the right.  Requires careful use of tiles for offense and defense.  Includes: Single Player vs. CPU Mode Two Player Mode (optionally share a single controller) Bonus Game: Box the Gopher!
